title: A detailed interpretation of prison in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of prison in a dream by Ibn Sirin and others in general indicates a way out of distress and distress, and we all remember the story of Joseph, peace be upon him, and how prison was better for him than rebellion, as it meant honoring him and taking over the treasures of Egypt, and in this article we learn about a series of visions of prison in a dream According to scholars, so follow us in the encyclopedia. Interpretation of prison in a dream by Ibn Sirin. If he sees himself in prison with others, this indicates that he will return from exile. If he sees that he will be released from prison, this indicates his release from solitary confinement. And if he sees that the prison doors are open, this indicates that It indicates freedom or happiness. If he sees a prison with light coming from its windows, it shows comfort. And if he sees that while he is in prison, this indicates that he will soon emerge from the distress he is experiencing, God Almighty willing, and that he will be released from prison. Interpretation of imprisonment in a dream for the Imam Al-SadiqImam Jaafar Al-Sadiq says: If he sees prison and is imprisoned, it means that he will get what he wants and that good will come true. God Almighty said: “The Lord of the prison said, ‘Indeed, I love what I am called to.’ And if it is unknown, then it is torment, error, and sadness. Joseph, peace be upon him, said: ‘The prison is the grave of the living, the house of sorrow, the experience of friends, and the praise of enemies.’” “And whoever sees that he has been released from detention, he will emerge from his complete hatred against religion and this world towards justice and goodness. And whoever dreams of being released from prison and then wants to return to it, he is being pursued by an unwanted relationship after Satan has beautified it for him, God willing. He dreams of entering prison and then being released soon. God will complete His command for him. Interpretation of a dream about imprisoning a husband. If a married woman sees that her husband has entered prison, this indicates an abundance of money and many good things that await her, and perhaps this indicates the approaching pregnancy, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about unfair entry To prison: Whoever dreams of being unjustly imprisoned, this may be evidence of the distress and injustice he is suffering to his relatives. Interpretation of a dream about prison and crying: Whoever sees himself crying in prison indicates his salvation from worry and distress, and if he cries leaning against the prison wall, this indicates joy and happiness, God willing. A dream about prison For a single girl: If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is going to prison, this indicates her marriage to a wealthy man, for whom God will open the doors of livelihood. This was our discussion about the interpretation of prison in a dream. For a different dream interpretation, you can visit our instant dream interpretation app.

title: Interpretation of eating nuts in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the vision of eating walnuts by Ibn Sirin. The interpretation of seeing walnuts in a dream is evidence of the presence of righteous people in the dreamer’s life. If one sees in a dream that he is cutting walnuts from a tree, this indicates the money that the dreamer will receive from a woman. Eating peeled walnuts is evidence of the abundance of money that he obtains. The dreamer does it without fatigue or effort. Seeing yourself eating walnut shells indicates gossip and gossip. Walnuts in a dream indicate sadness and sorrow. Seeing a dream that you are eating nuts is for Nabulsi. Eating bitter walnuts in a dream is evidence of the money that the dreamer gets, but after hard work. If Seeing that you are eating nuts that have a bad taste and are damaged, this indicates a contaminated disease. Seeing that you are eating nuts with a bad smell is a sign of problems and anxiety. A dream about eating walnuts for a single woman. Eating sweet walnuts in a dream for an unmarried woman is a sign that she will get married soon and she will be very happy. If Taking walnuts from someone in a dream is a sign of kindness and abundant profit. If a girl sees that she is breaking walnuts in a dream, this indicates the achievement of goals and aspirations. Seeing her eating walnuts for a married woman. Seeing a sick woman in a dream is eating nuts, this will be good news for recovery in the near future. Walnuts in general in a married woman’s dream are evidence of happiness and extreme joy. Selling walnuts in a dream is a sign of success and success in work. If a married woman sees her hand contaminated with walnuts and becoming impure, this is an unpleasant vision. A dream about eating walnuts for a pregnant woman. Eating walnuts in a woman’s dream Pregnant woman is a sign that the due date of childbirth is approaching and you will be fine. Seeing yourself eating sweet nuts is a sign of infatuation with the baby you want, whether it is a girl or a boy. Interpretation of a dream of seeing nuts for a man: Seeing a dream of broken camel eyes in a dream is evidence of a lot of money that this person gets As for dreaming of hearing the sound of cracking walnuts, this indicates the problems that the dreamer faces. Dreaming of buying walnuts is evidence of achieving goals and fulfilling all one’s desires. Add the dream that you would like to interpret by referring to the marital status in a comment below the article and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Interpretation of seeing perfume, spraying it, and buying it in a divorced woman’s dream according to Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing perfume, spraying it, and buying it in a divorced woman’s dream according to Al-Nabulsi. Perfumes have been used for thousands of years and seeing perfumes in a divorced woman’s dream is one of the praiseworthy visions that carries in its content a group of good interpretations and associations. Interpretation of a dream about perfumes for a divorced womanMany interpretive scholars have confirmed that seeing perfume in a divorced woman’s dream is generally evidence of kindness and abundant nourishment that She will have many positive changes in her life. Among the most important indicators and interpretations of this vision are the following: Seeing a bottle of perfume in a divorced woman’s dream is evidence that she will receive kindness and sustenance, and it is good news of compensation for worry and sadness. If a divorced woman sees a perfume bottle in her dream, but it is empty, this indicates that she has gone through many troubles. Ibn Sirin believes that if a divorced woman sees in her dream that she is buying a bottle of perfume, this is good news for a lot of money, but if she puts a bottle of perfume in her pocket, this is evidence of great material gains. Seeing perfume in a divorced woman’s dream is evidence that he lives a stable and calm life. See also: Interpretation of a dream of many cats in a dream by Ibn Sirin and al-Nabul. Interpretation of a vision of buying perfumes in a dream for a divorced woman. Seeing yourself buying perfume in a dream implies positive signs and foreshadowing that will occur in the dreamer’s real life. Buying perfumes in a dream has a number of interpretations, including: If a divorced woman dreams that she is buying a man’s perfume, this is good news that she will receive good nutrition and abundance. If a divorced woman sees in her dream that she bought a man’s perfume for someone in a dream, this is evidence of her marriage to a good man. If a divorced woman sees in her dream that she is buying a man’s perfume that smells good, this is evidence that she will live a calm and stable life and overcome all the misfortunes that she faced during her life. If you dream that you are buying an expensive perfume for a divorced woman, this means that she will marry a wealthy man and live A luxurious life. Seeing yourself buying perfume in a dream is evidence of the end of all crises and problems. Interpretation of seeing the smell of perfume in a dream for a divorced woman. The interpretation of seeing perfume in a divorced woman’s dream varies depending on the circumstances surrounding her and the details of the vision. Seeing the smell of perfume in a divorced woman’s dream is evidence that she has committed many mistakes, and that A woman follows her desires, and she must repent and return to God. Seeing the smell of perfume in a divorced woman’s dream means that this woman is making efforts to deal with problems and issues and is doing her best to make decisive decisions in her life. If a divorced woman sees in a dream that she is perfumed her bed, this indicates that she She will get married soon. Seeing the smell of perfume in a divorced woman’s dream indicates a lot of strength, kindness, and that woman’s strong faith in God - Glory be to Him. See also: Interpretation of a dream about money and giving it in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing a spray of perfume in a dream for a divorced woman. Seeing perfume in general in a dream has many meanings. The repercussions and indicators are good and positive. The interpretation of a dream about spraying perfume varies depending on the place where the perfume was sprayed. This vision has several connotations, including: If a woman sees a...

title: Interpretation of a dream about a thorn entering the foot in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about getting caught in a thorn in a leg in a dream When you search for an interpretation of a dream about getting a thorn in one’s leg in a dream, it is one of the dreams that makes the dreamer feel very anxious, but he wants to find an explanation for it. The site does not interfere in interpretations, but rather conveys the interpretations of scholars. Interpretation of a dream about a thorn entering the foot in a dream: Seeing a thorn sticking to the foot in a dream may indicate harm that may happen to the dreamer during those days. The presence of a thorn in the leg of the dream may indicate that the dreamer will be exposed to a problem and betrayal during this period. Whoever sees a thorn in his foot in his dream may indicate To the negligence that the dreamer falls into and must ask God for help. Seeing a man may indicate happy events that come to the dreamer during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a crow entering the house in a dream: Whoever dreams of a crow entering the house may indicate some bad thoughts that the dreamer faces in the dream. That time. A crow entering the house in a dream may indicate overcoming the difficulties that the dreamer faced in those days. Seeing a crow entering the house in a dream may mean that people are attacking it and that it will overcome it with God’s grace. Seeing a crow entering the house in a dream may indicate some problems. The health that the dreamer faces during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of entering the grave of the Prophet in a dream. Whoever dreams that the grave of the Prophet is in his house, this indicates his good morals. Entering the grave of the Prophet in a dream may indicate the fulfillment of desires and dreams in those days. If one sees that he entered the grave The Messenger, this may indicate his success and distinction in life. Seeing him entering the grave of the Messenger in a dream may indicate some positive changes occurring in his life during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a snake entering the anus in a dream: Seeing a snake entering the anus in a dream It indicates some problems and difficulties that the dreamer faces. If you see a snake entering the anus in a dream, this may indicate the obstacles that the dreamer will face in his life during those days. This dream may also indicate some of the dreamer’s sins, disobedience, and repentance to the Blessed God. The highest. This vision may indicate the inability of the dreamer to achieve his goals and aspirations, so he must seek help from God Almighty. Interpretation of a dream of entering a morgue in a dream. Seeing a morgue in a dream may indicate some of the suffering that the dreamer is suffering from during this time. In the event that one sees The morgue may indicate that the dreamer is exposed to some problems and crises in his life. Seeing a morgue in a dream may indicate some financial crises that the dreamer faces during this time. If one sees a morgue in a dream, this may indicate that one is exposed to the loss of someone he loves during this time, by God. title: Interpretation of a dream about a deceased person communicating with his wife in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a dead man having sex with his wife in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a deceased person having sex with his wife in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a dead man having sex with his wife in a dream could indicate money and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees the deceased uniting with his wife in a dream, it may be a sign. On sustenance and blessings, God willing. If a widow sees her deceased husband getting married with her, this may lead to the satisfaction of desires, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When a widow sees her husband sleeping with her in a dream, this may be a sign of goodness, and God knows all that is unseen. Interpretation of a dream about calling a dead wife in Dream Interpretation of a dream about intercourse with a dead wife in a dream can indicate the fulfillment of what he desires, and God knows everything that is unseen. If the dreamer sees intercourse with his dead wife in a dream, this may be evidence of justice, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. It can also lead to neglecting religion, and God has knowledge of the unseen. If he sees The dreamer has intercourse with his deceased wife in a dream, as this may indicate something that he will not be able to achieve, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about a dead brother having sex with his sister in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about a dead brother having intercourse with his sister in a dream. Perhaps seeing intercourse with a dead person indicates illness, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If she sees A married woman has intercourse with a dead man, it may express unpleasant things, and God knows the unseen. When she sees intercourse with a dead man, it may lead to sadness, and God knows best. If a divorced woman sees in a dream intercourse with a dead person, she may express anxiety and sadness, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about my parents getting married to My mother in a dream: Interpretation of a dream about my father marrying my mother in a dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this, except that contact with the mother may lead to enmity with the father, and God knows best. Seeing intercourse with his mother in a dream can also indicate that the son will replace the father in the event of his illness, and God knows the unseen. If a married man sees intercourse with his mother in a dream, he may return to his father. And God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about having sex with my sister’s husband in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about contacting my sister’s husband in a dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this. However, seeing a sister’s husband getting married in a dream may represent the good that he achieves, and God is All-Knowing. If an unmarried girl sees herself in a dream marrying her sister’s husband, this may lead to maintenance, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When one sees a girl getting married to Her sister’s husband in a dream, this may represent the benefit she gained, and God knows all that we did not see.Interpretation of a dream about incest in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about incest in a dream Seeing adultery with incest can indicate problems and crises, and God knows all that is not seenWhen you see intercourse in A dream may be a sign of judgments, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees incestuous adultery in a dream, this may lead to disputes, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing makeup in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing makeup in a dream by Ibn Sirin: The Islamic teachings emphasized by Islam were not matters that did not benefit a person, but rather that what Islam ordered was for the benefit of Muslims and what it prohibited was harmful to the Muslim. If he did that, beautification and going out with adornments were among the most prominent things that the Islamic religion condemned because of its influence on people, and from here we explain to you the interpretation of the dream of seeing adornments in. A dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of the dream of seeing makeup in a dream by Ibn Sirin, especially since the scholar Ibn Sirin was interested in clarifying these concepts and connections contained in these dreams and visions that we see in the dream, including the appearance of details in the dream. In this context, we will explain to you the interpretation of the dream of seeing makeup in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Serene consists of the following: In the event that grooming appears in a married woman’s dream. This dream is evidence of her husband’s love for her and this makes her permanently beautify herself so that she can be in the best image in front of her husband. In addition, a married woman has grown up and saw in her dream that she is wearing makeup. This vision is An indication that this woman is trying to hide what time has done to her features. Or that this woman is trying to hide something from her husband in real life. In addition, if a married woman sees in a dream that she is wearing makeup and she is sad. This shows some of the problems that are bothering and disturbing her in her life. She also tries to overcome her husband’s apparent negligence and negligence, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a snake or snake in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing makeup in a dream for a single woman. title: What is the interpretation of seeing potatoes in a dream according to Ibn Sirin for a married woman?

preview.html: What is the interpretation of a dream about potatoes? Potatoes in a dream for a married woman can be good news for her that there is a good door that will open soon, and here it is necessary to praise and praise God and it can be a warning of evil that can affect the soul, health or the home, and here it is necessary to Be careful and attentive, the determining factor of the meaning of the dream is the sequence of events one after another in the dream and the psychological state of the viewer, as well as or various circumstances. Natural, practical or social, follow along with us to learn what the great commentators explained about this vision. Potatoes in a dream for a married woman. Cooking at home and eating delicious potato slices. As the taste of this fruit is beautiful, its meaning includes beauty and improvement of circumstances, as various sorrows that Family members may experience it with the most beautiful moments of happiness and contentment. You still do not find an interpretation of your dream? Go to Google and search for an Egyptian website for interpreting dreams. Interpretation of potatoes in a dream by Ibn SirinIbn Sirin is one of the leading scholars of dream interpretation, and he was known for his honesty and confidence in interpretation. Looking at the special encyclopedia of interpretation, we can say about this vision that it can mean: A state of lack of funds and lack of sources to bring in money as it was in the past, which requires the wife to try to search for the mistake so that she can avoid it. Buying potatoes in a dream Events often vary Dreams from one person to another, where one finds that he is buying them, while the other dreams that he is selling them, and both dreamers have a different interpretation, as we find that: A wife who goes to the market or store to buy potatoes in a dream, will have to suffer from problems and troubles for a long time, but there is no need To worry. Because all these sad things will disappear in time. As for the opposite of this dream, which is selling to either a stranger or a known person, it means that the woman will put an end to what is bothering her and get rid of her troubles forever, which will make her life more peaceful and secure. A happier marriage than before. Seeing a dream that you are peeling potatoes for a married woman. Seeing a married woman peeling potatoes in a dream shows her ability to overcome the problems that she was going through in her life in the past days and she will be more comfortable after that. If the dreamer sees during his sleep that she is peeling potatoes, then this A sign that the difficulties she faced will go away and the following periods will be happier for her. If the dreamer sees herself peeling potatoes in her dream, this represents the happy life she enjoys with her husband and children and her desire not to disturb anything in her life. Seeing the dreamer in her dream peeling potatoes, It symbolizes the good news that she will receive and that will spread a lot of joy and happiness around her. If a woman sees in her dream that she is peeling potatoes, this is a sign of good things that will happen in her life and will be very satisfying for her. Interpretation of planting potatoes in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a married woman planting potatoes In a dream, it means that her husband will receive an important promotion at his workplace that will contribute to improving his career

title: Interpretation of a dream about a thief by Ibn Sirin, and his dream about the interpretation of a thief who did not steal anything, and his dream about the interpretation of a thief entering the house.

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a thief: Seeing a thief portends good or bad? What are the negative connotations of a dream about a thief? What does a black thief mean in a dream? In the lines of this article, we will talk about the interpretation of seeing a protector for unmarried, married, and pregnant women, according to Ibn Sirin and leading interpretation scholars. Interpretation of a dream about a thief: A thief in a dream symbolizes that the dreamer will soon return to an old friend after a long period of separation from him. And if the dreamer sees a thief in his house and does not If something is stolen from him, this is a sign that he is receiving psychological and moral support from family members. Keeping a thief at home is a sign of the ability to confront problems and not escape from them, and scholars interpreted the thief’s vision of the poor as evidence that he will become rich in the near future and pay off all his debts. • Religion warns the monarch to stay away from it so that he does not fall into misfortunes. Interpretation of a dream about a thief by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing a thief as evidence of hypocrites and malicious people who bear the bad intentions of the dreamer and he must be careful and take care of them, and a thief who steals clothes in a dream is a sign of falling into misfortunes. Unable to get out of it, and if the thief steals gold from the dreamer, this warns that his enemies are conspiring against him. If the dreamer steals and cannot see the thief, this means that the death of one of his relatives is approaching, and God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing, so the dream could be a warning for him . He goes to visit them and reassures them. The online dream interpretation website is a website specialized in interpreting dreams in the Arab world. Just write. The online dream interpretation website. Search on Google and get the correct interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about a thief for a single woman. A thief in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates an unsuitable groom who will propose to her Marriage is coming soon, and she should not agree to it so that she does not regret it later. However, if the dreamer sees a man stealing something from her workplace, this indicates her imminent marriage contract with a handsome man who has all the good qualities that she dreamed of and hoped for. The thief who steals food in the vision is a sign that she She will hear some good news in the coming tomorrow and have a lot of fun with the family soon, but if the thief steals her clothes it symbolizes problems, judgments and inability to continue. In the pursuit of achieving goals and ambitions. What is the interpretation of fear of thieves in a single woman’s dream? An unmarried girl who dreams that she is afraid of a thief indicates that she is surrounded by bad people lurking around her to fall into traps and snares, and she must be careful. Also, seeing fear of a thief in a dream shows an unmarried woman the problems and difficulties that she will face in the coming period in her professional and social life. If An unmarried girl dreamed that she was afraid of thieves, as this symbolizes her non-compliance with the teachings of her religion and her distance from her Lord. What is the interpretation of a dream about a thief chasing me for a single woman? An unmarried girl who sees a thief chasing her in a dream and is able to escape from it indicates that she has gone through a difficult stage In her life, she started over with the strength of hope and optimism

title: Interpretation of dreams about lice emerging from the hair: Dreaming of lice in my hair in a dream

preview.html: Contents: A dream about lice coming out of the head and killing them. Combing the hair and lice falling out of the hair. Black lice for pregnant women, for single women. Interpretation of hair lice in a dream. Lice in a dream represents the world and money, as seeing many lice in a dream indicates torment, but on the other hand, it can be a blessing. And a blessing and goodness. Whoever sees lice coming out of his hair indicates that envy and anxiety have arisen from him. Lice in a dream of a world of money. Whoever sees a lot of lice on his body and begins to leave them, then there is nothing good and there is no good in him, whether the lice is in his hair or in the rest of his body. If it is Lice on a new shirt is a renewal of a will, and if the shirt is old, it is a debt they fear for, and lice on the ground are weak people, and if they have nails. It is a weak epidemic. Whoever sees lice coming out of his hair shows an appearance of envy and anguish. Whoever sees: A louse flew from his chest, then his servant, servant, or son escaped from him. Kings’ lice are soldiers and enemies, ministers are grateful, police have assistants, scholars have students, and patients suffer from Long term illness. Whoever sees: that he threw a live lice, something contrary to the Sunnah is coming, and lice is a lot of torment, and people are dependent, and people are poor and miserable gossip, or that it is the best blessing, grace and salvation. Of sorrows and worries. And if he sees a lot of lice, this is evidence of prolonged illness, loss, and poverty, and relieving the afflicted of his distress, and saving him from distress by killing them. Whoever picks lice from his clothes is told an obscene lie, and whoever bites a lice, the weak person desires him with words. Interpretation of a dream about lice in Poetry - YouTube

title: Interpretation of a dream about a kite

preview.html: Interpretation of a kite by Ibn SirinInterpretation of dreamsA kite in a dream is evidence that he was flying in the sky, this indicates happiness and a lot of nourishment. Seeing yourself making a kite in a dream is a sign of success and achieving goals. If the dreamer sees many people making a group of kites, This indicates the achievement of goals and dreams. Watching kites for Nablus. Seeing a cut kite in a dream is a sign of sadness, anxiety, and trouble. As for seeing the coloring of the kite in a dream, it indicates the blessing and happiness experienced by the dreamer. Seeing buying a kite in a dream is a sign of good luck. And a lot of good. Dreaming of a kite falling in a dream is a sign of failure and disappointment. Dreaming of a kite for individuals. A kite in an unmarried woman’s dream is evidence of her desire to achieve goals and fulfill dreams. A kite in a dream is a sign of kindness and broad nourishment. Seeing a colorful kite In a dream, it is a sign of achieving goals and ambitions. A dream about a kite for a married woman. The vision that came true. A kite in a dream is evidence of getting rid of sadness and problems. A dream about seeing a kite in the sky is a sign of happy days. Seeing a pregnant kite. A kite in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates sadness. And problems. If a pregnant woman sees that she is making a kite, this indicates the end of her worries and problems. A man’s dream of a kite. Seeing a man in a dream cutting a kite, this indicates the collapse of worries and problems. A colorful kite in a man’s dream is a sign of a happy life and the joys he experiences. The dreamer. Dreaming of a kite flying in the sky is evidence that he has heard a lot of good news. If a man sees in a dream that he is making a kite, this indicates success in work. A kite in a dream in general for a young man is evidence of the psychological calm that the dreamer feels. If a young man sees If an unmarried kite rises in the sky, this indicates that he will soon marry a girl of good character. Add the dream that you would like to interpret with reference to marital status in a comment below the article and we will respond to it and clarify it.
